original_title: 金枝玉叶之睡在下流社会的日子
overview: They became good brothers who were close to each other, and their partners were particularly upset. In the world of the game, the two met the rich girl Xiao Baili because they did good deeds. George and Mi Gaobing released their previous suspicions and worked together to start a life-and-death battle with the Flying Dragon Gang... Long Zuozhi accidentally killed another person in prison because of a dispute with the Flying Dragon Gang. They don’t know each other, they become good brothers who have a close relationship with each other, and they have a partner who specializes in fighting. In the world of the game, the two of them are doing good deeds, and they met the rich girl Xiao Baili, and pursued together. They almost turned into hatred. The Eagles clashed, and George and Mi Gaobing released their previous suspicions, working together to start a life-and-death battle with the Flying Dragons...
title: Undercover Girls
